spark.notes: All v0.9.0 features implemented. Binaries compiled and tested with ulimit -s unlimited. Known issues: loop variable declarations missing, switch statement output failures. See test_outputs/v0.9.0_spark_final/ for results.

next_steps: Fix SPARK ir_to_code: loop variable declarations
Fix SPARK ir_to_code: switch statement output write failures
SPARK stack optimization (reduce Max_Cases, use heap allocation)
version_status: v0.9.0 COMPLETE - break/continue/switch in Python, Rust, and SPARK (feature-complete)

v0.9.0_notes.achievement: All three pipelines (Python, Rust, SPARK) now support break/continue/switch statements
v0.9.0_notes.spark_status: SPARK binaries successfully compiled and tested. 6/6 tests generate IR, 3/6 generate C code, 1/6 compiles. Implementation is feature-complete but requires codegen bug fixes for production use.
v0.9.0_notes.recommendation: Use Python or Rust pipelines for production. SPARK suitable for formal verification workflows with known limitations.
